*** Test Case ***

Passing
    Log    Pass message

Failing
    Fail    Fail message

For loop
    :FOR    ${i}    IN    one    two    three
    \    Log    For message ${i}
    Fail    Cannot pass

Wait until keyword succeeds
     Set Test Variable    $COUNTER    ${0}
     Wait Until Keyword Succeeds    1s    0.01s    My Keyword
     Fail    Cannot pass

*** Keywords ***

My Keyword
    Set Test Variable    $COUNTER    ${COUNTER + 1}
    Run Keyword If    ${COUNTER} < 10    Fail    WUKS message
